import java.util.*;

public final class CF1669_6 {

    public static void main(String[] args) {

        Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in);

        int tnr = in.nextInt();

        for (int t = 0; t < tnr; t++) {

            int n = in.nextInt();

            long[] w = new long[n];

            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {

                w[i] = in.nextLong();

            }

            // Compute prefix sums

            long[] prefix = new long[n+1];

            for (int i = 1; i <=n; i++) {

                prefix[i] = prefix[i-1] + w[i-1];

            }

            // Compute suffix sums

            long[] suffix = new long[n+1];

            for (int i = 1; i <=n; i++) {

                suffix[i] = suffix[i-1] + w[n -i];

            }

            // Create a map to store the maximum b for each sum.

            Map<Long, Integer> sumToMaxB = new HashMap<>();

            for (int b =0; b <=n; b++) {

                long s = suffix[b];

                if (!sumToMaxB.containsKey(s) || b > sumToMaxB.get(s)) {

                    sumToMaxB.put(s, b);

                }

            }

            int maxTotal =0;

            for (int a =0; a <=n; a++) {

                long s = prefix[a];

                if (sumToMaxB.containsKey(s)) {

                    int b = sumToMaxB.get(s);

                    if (a + b <=n) {

                        if (a + b > maxTotal) {

                            maxTotal = a + b;

                        }

                    }

                }

            }

            System.out.println(maxTotal);

        }

        in.close();

    }

}
